name: cirrus
description:
cirrus (ver. 0.00) is a Yume Nikki fangame made by illydna, Reeve Cutler (Damask Dreams) and Seamstress Witch in RPG Maker VX Ace. The first version was made for Dream Diary Jam 2 under six weeks. 

Like in the original, you can sleep, explore dreams, find effects and wake up. There is no text or dialogue as well, aside from the instructions and a few words. 

Current features:
- 2 accessible main worlds
- Around 10 different areas to explore
- 3 effects to collect
- 2 special events to find

Disclaimer: As of now, there is a low amount of horror content. This may vary on future updates.

Controls, credits and contact links are featured in the Instruction Manual in the game folder.

Enjoy!
